product_summary: TAWNY is a privacy-first Vision AI company that uses video analytics to analyze human behavior. Their technology can be used to decode complex human affective states and behavior in real-time using simple camera hardware.

product_usecases.details: TAWNY's technology can be used to track audience engagement and behavior at live events, such as conferences, concerts, and sporting events.
TAWNY's technology can be used to track customer behavior in retail stores, such as dwell time, foot traffic, and product engagement.
TAWNY's technology can be used to track patient behavior in healthcare settings, such as waiting rooms and hospitals.
TAWNY's technology can be used to track student behavior in classrooms, such as attention levels and engagement.
TAWNY's technology can be used to track consumer behavior in response to advertising campaigns.

product_toolfor.details: TAWNY's technology can be used by researchers to study human behavior in a variety of settings.
TAWNY's technology can be used by marketers to track the effectiveness of their marketing campaigns.
TAWNY's technology can be used by product designers to improve the user experience of their products.
TAWNY's technology can be used by business owners to improve the efficiency of their operations.
TAWNY's technology can be used by educators to improve the learning experience of their students.

product_pricing: Pricing information is not available on the website.
